plot: After the events of _Reiton kyôju to eien no utahime (2009)_, Layton, Luke and Emmy's pursuit of Jean Descole now brings them to Montdol, a casino city fabled to have been created magically by a wish-fulfilling mask.
title: Reiton-kyôju to kiseki no kamen
plot_es: After the events of _Reiton kyôju to eien no utahime (2009)_, Layton, Luke and Emmy's pursuit of Jean Descole now brings them to Montdol, a casino city fabled to have been created magically by a wish-fulfilling mask.
plot_en: After the events of _Reiton kyôju to eien no utahime (2009)_, Layton, Luke and Emmy's pursuit of Jean Descole now brings them to Montdol, a casino city fabled to have been created magically by a wish-fulfilling mask.
